text: Michael Landon (October 31, 1936 - July 1, 1991) was an American actor. He is best known for his roles on the TV shows, Bonanza, Little House on the Prairie, and Highway to Heaven. == Other websites == *Little House Wiki: Michael Landon Category:1935 births Category:1991 deaths Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Michael Landon
